author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: قلم اعلی در کلّ حین ندا میفرماید ولکن اهل سمع کمیاب الوان مختلفهٴ د
translation: The Pen of the Most High is unceasingly calling; and yet, how few are those that have inclined their ear to its voice! The dwellers of the kingdom of names have busied themselves with the gay livery of the world, forgetful that every man that hath eyes to perceive and ears to hear cannot but readily recognize how evanescent are its colors.
